```{r setup}
library(Matrix)
library(varistran)
library(airway)

data("airway")
x <- assay(airway, "counts")

x[,1] <- rbinom(nrow(x), x[,1], 0.01) 

lnorm <- samesum_log2_norm(x)

plot_heatmap(lnorm, feature_labels=rowData(airway)$symbol, n=50)

plot_stability(lnorm, bins=200)

plot_biplot(lnorm)


# You can also use a sparse matrix

x <- Matrix(assay(airway, "counts"))
lnorm <- samesum_log2_norm(x)
```
